text:
Buva#nasyaq rEtO# gAqtuM dha#ttaq yaja#mAnAya dEvAH | uqpAkRu#ta(gm) SaSamAqnaM ~MyadasthA$jjIqvaM dEqvAnAqmapyE#tuq pAtha#H || nAnA$ prAqNO yaja#mAnasya paqSunA# yaqj~jO dEqvEBi#H saqha dE#vaqyAna#H | 
jIqvaM dEqvAnAqmapyE#tuq pAtha#H saqtyAH sa#ntuq yaja#mAnasyaq kAmA$H || 
yat paqSurmAqyumakRuqtOrO# vA paqdBirA#haqtE | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdEna#sOq viSvA$n mu~jcaqtva(gm)ha#saH || Sami#tAra uqpEta#na yaqj~jaM - [  ]   13
